ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lmodacl.f | |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 2 |  | lmodacl.k | |- K = ( Base ` F ) |
| 3 |  | lmodacl.p | |- .+ = ( +g ` F ) |
| 4 | 1 | #P_lmodfgrp | |- ( W e. LMod -> F e. Grp ) |
| 5 | 2, 3 | #P_grpcl | |- ( ( F e. Grp /\ X e. K /\ Y e. K ) -> ( X .+ Y ) e. K ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_syl3an1 | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ X e. K /\ Y e. K ) -> ( X .+ Y ) e. K ) |
